languages.text: {n}Гигант чуть поводит плечами.{/n} "За это я также прошу прощения. Среди удушающего невежества, коим полны миряне — и даже многие мои братья — я не ожидал найти понимания. Потому и решил исполнить свою миссию на корабле тайно, не обращаясь к тебе за разрешением".

{n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."
languages.original_text: {n}Гигант чуть поводит плечами.{/n} "За это я также прошу прощения. Среди удушающего невежества, коим полны миряне — и даже многие мои братья — я не ожидал найти понимания. Потому и решил исполнить свою миссию на корабле тайно, не обращаясь к тебе за разрешением".

traits.locale_text: {n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without asking you for permission."

{n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without asking you for permission."

{n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

{n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

{n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

languages.text: {n}巨人の肩が少し動く。{/n}「それについても謝罪する。まさか俗人の、そして多くの同胞についても同様の息が詰まりそうな無知の渦中にあって理解が得られるとは思ってもみなかった。そういう理由から、あなたの許可を得ずに秘密裏にミッションを続けることにしたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人の肩が少し動く。{/n}「それについても謝罪する。まさか俗人の、そして多くの同胞についても同様の息が詰まりそうな無知の渦中にあって理解が得られるとは思ってもみなかった。そういう理由から、あなたの許可を得ずに秘密裏にミッションを続けることにしたのだ」

languages.text: {n}巨人的肩膀微微动了动。{/n}“我也为此道歉，因此我从没想过教外人士能理解我们，甚至就连我的许多兄弟都无法理解我们，他们身上总是充斥着令人窒息的无知。正因如此，我才会选择秘密执行我的任务，没有征求你的许可。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人的肩膀微微动了动。{/n}“我也为此道歉，因此我从没想过教外人士能理解我们，甚至就连我的许多兄弟都无法理解我们，他们身上总是充斥着令人窒息的无知。正因如此，我才会选择秘密执行我的任务，没有征求你的许可。”

languages.text: {n}Die Schultern des Riesen verlagern sich leicht.{/n} "Auch dafür bitte ich um Entschuldigung. Ich hatte nicht erwartet, inmitten der erdrückenden Ignoranz, die im Laienstand vorherrscht, Verständnis vorzufinden — und sogar viele meiner Brüder. Aus diesem Grund habe ich entschieden, meine Mission im Geheimen auszuführen und Euch nicht um Erlaubnis zu bitten."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Schultern des Riesen verlagern sich leicht.{/n} "Auch dafür bitte ich um Entschuldigung. Ich hatte nicht erwartet, inmitten der erdrückenden Ignoranz, die im Laienstand vorherrscht, Verständnis vorzufinden — und sogar viele meiner Brüder. Aus diesem Grund habe ich entschieden, meine Mission im Geheimen auszuführen und Euch nicht um Erlaubnis zu bitten."

languages.text: {n}Les épaules du géant se contractent légèrement.{/n} « Je vous présente également mes excuses à ce sujet. Je ne pensais pas trouver la moindre compréhension dans cette ignorance étouffante qui sévit chez les laïcs et même chez bon nombre de mes semblables. C'est pour cette raison que j'ai choisi d'accomplir ma mission en secret, sans vous demander la permission. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les épaules du géant se contractent légèrement.{/n} « Je vous présente également mes excuses à ce sujet. Je ne pensais pas trouver la moindre compréhension dans cette ignorance étouffante qui sévit chez les laïcs et même chez bon nombre de mes semblables. C'est pour cette raison que j'ai choisi d'accomplir ma mission en secret, sans vous demander la permission. »

languages.text: {n}Los hombros del gigante se hunden un poco.{/n} «También pido disculpas por eso. No esperaba hallar comprensión entre la asfixiante ignorancia que abunda entre los seglares; incluso entre muchos de mis hermanos. Por ese motivo opté por emprender mi misión en secreto y sin procurarme antes su permiso».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los hombros del gigante se hunden un poco.{/n} «También pido disculpas por eso. No esperaba hallar comprensión entre la asfixiante ignorancia que abunda entre los seglares; incluso entre muchos de mis hermanos. Por ese motivo opté por emprender mi misión en secreto y sin procurarme antes su permiso».

languages.text: {n}Devin omuzları hafifçe hareket ediyor.{/n} "Bunun için de ayrıca özür dilerim. Boğucu cehaletle dolup taşan kâfirliğin ortasında hâlden anlayanları bulmayı beklemiyordum... Bu illet, kardeşlerimin dahi çoğunu ele geçirdi. Bu yüzden görevimi gizlice yerine getirmeyi seçtim ve izin almaya teşebbüs etmedim."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's shoulders shift slightly.{/n} "For that, I apologise as well. I did not expect to find understanding amid the suffocating ignorance that abounds within the laity — and even many of my brethren. For this reason, I chose to carry out my mission in secret and without seeking your permission."

Bu illet, kardeşlerimin dahi çoğunu ele geçirdi. Bu yüzden görevimi gizlice yerine getirmeyi seçtim ve izin almaya teşebbüs etmedim."
